english.segment1: You got me feeling like I do. You know you're not me. But you're feeling like me too. And I know you were going to be mine. But I took a little too much time
english.segment2: Do do do do do do
english.segment3: I watch you giving life to someone new. But you see me holding out for something too. And I keep selling wishes to the sky. But they never seem to get that high
english.segment4: Do do do do do do
english.segment5: When i'm seeing black sheep. In wolves clothing. I see it's a lie. I know it's a lie
english.segment6: Help me 'cause i'm tired of living numb. But you leave me keeping face with everyone. And I could let you know that I was wrong. I'm still waiting for the perfect time
english.segment7: Do do do do do do.
